version_description:
- Adds new data metrics to the workout detail page in the app, for example, avg. HR, avg. cadence, cycling elevation change, and moving time of each lap, etc.
- Adds Pool Swim to Triathlon mode. Allows customized triathlon mode.
- Adds new watch face options available for download via COROS app.
- Allows customization on the bottom field on the data screen.
- Introduces Watermark Image - an artistic way to share training details with your choice of background image to social media and local photo albums.

- Adds Navigation function including breadcrumb trail for APEX
- Enhances the sensitivity and accuracy of pace related metrics
- Adds 1/5/10 km/mi split for viewing on the COROS app
- Adds French support. Bonjour!

- Adds Navigation function including breadcrumb trail for APEX
- Enhances the sensitivity and accuracy of pace related metrics
- Adds 1/5/10 km/mi split for viewing on the COROS app
- Adds French support. Bonjour!

- Adds Navigation function including breadcrumb trail for APEX
- Enhances the sensitivity and accuracy of pace related metrics
- Adds 1/5/10 km/mi split for viewing on the COROS app
- Adds French support. Bonjour!
－ Adds workout data integration support on a new thrid party platform

Introducing VERTIX GPS Adventure Watch - the most durable GPS watch on the PLANET.

A watch for all of your training needs. The longest battery life, extreme durability and altitude acclimation assistance making the VERTIX your go-to choice whether your plans call for a backyard hike or a Himalayan summit.
- Updates the integration with a third party platform.

- Adds indoor/outdoor Cardio modes which record heart rate, calories and split time on VERTIX/APEX models.
- Supports a bigger font size for data pages in workout modes on VERTIX/APEX models.

- Cardio modes and 3rd party apps syncing bug fixes.
- Navigation route file compatibility enhancements.

- Introducing COROS APEX Pro Premium Multisport GPS Watch. With all of the great features of the Original APEX, combined with the added Pulse Oximeter, Altitude Advisory, Touch Screen Technology and increased battery life, the APEX Pro is our most versatile watch yet for endurance athletes training on various conditions.

Introducing the new Track Run mode for 400-meter track runs.
- Receive accurate distance, pace and other data when running on an outdoor 400-meter standard track.

Introducing the COROS Performance Optimization Device (POD) providing accurate tracking of advanced running metrics such as running power, run efficiency, L/R balance and more.

Introducing the new workout overview system.
- Monthly summary for running data combining Run, Trail Run and Hike modes.
- Fitness index history overview for VO2 max, lactate threshold and more.

Watch enhancements and optimizations.
- Adds enhanced daily HR option to display HR reading on select watch faces. Setup via System > Sensor > Daily HR.
- Adds weather forecast feature based on the last 6 hours of the air pressure changes.
- Adds Storm Alert feature for imminent weather changes. Setup via System > Sensors > Barometer.
- Adds navigation and “resume later” features for Bike mode.
- Adds arrows during the breadcrumb navigation to indicate the direction in case of forks and turnarounds.
- Enhances the sensitivity of the Gesture Backlight feature.

- Monthly summary for running data combining Run, Trail Run and Hike modes.

- Multiple bug fixes including the GPX route file import bug fix.
